name: Spell (itch)
description:
technically it's oct 5 right now, but as long as the last game gets done on time it's still 31 games in 31 days

click some runes (left) to customize your spell list (right)
once you've got a spell you like click memorize

after you've memorized 4 spells the duel begins

choose what spell to cast with each hand, then click lock

you gain 3 mana each round

if you don't select a spell for a hand, that hand won't cast anything that round

if you try to use mana you don't have, then the spell won't go off

hit the opponent 3 times and you win

get hit 3 times and you lose

press esc to restart the game
